tool_description:
Create crypto wallets of the 19 most popular cryptocurrencies.
Easy: GET request to desired chain, /bitcoin /etherium etc.
Supported chains:
     bitcoin,    algorand,    bcash,    bsc,    bnb,    celo,    ethereum,    one,    klaytn,    kcs,    litecoin,    polygon,    solana,    tron,    vet,    xdc,    xrp,    xlm,    dogecoin,
name: 🔴 CRYPTO WALLET CREATE 🔴 Daddy
title: 🔴 CRYPTO WALLET CREATE 🔴 Daddy

api_list.name: Create
api_list.description:
Create Crypto Wallet
Simply get request to the desired chain 
EX: https://crypto-wallet-create-daddy.p.rapidapi.com/bitcoin
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-wallet-create-daddy.p.rapidapi.com/bnb"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-wallet-create-daddy.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://crypto-wallet-create-daddy.p.rapidapi.com/{blockchain}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crypto-wallet-create-daddy.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
